text: I need to move blog posts from one "nav" category to another, then delete the old "nav" category. I've tried doing this on the "Settings" page but I could not figure out how to point the blog posts to the proper "nav" category. (please see attached) <https://blog.socialstudies.com/>
You should be able to combine two categories in the system.
if they are two blogs, you could update the post urls to the correct blog
